summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Dallas Area Partnership to End and Prevent Homelessness Local Government Corporation is convening for a regular meeting on January 4, 2024, at 12:00 PM at Dallas City Hall. The meeting aims to discuss ongoing initiatives and updates related to homelessness prevention and support in the Dallas area.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Call to Order and Roll Call  
2. Public Comment Session  
3. Approval of Minutes from the November 2, 2023, meeting  
4. Ongoing tracking of the Cost of Homelessness  
5. Review and distribution of revised Articles of Incorporation and Bylaws  
6. Committee Report on System Performance  
7. Update on the Temporary Housing Pilot Program  
8. Announcements of upcoming events and meetings  

**Important Details**:  
The agenda includes a briefing on the ongoing costs associated with homelessness, which will be presented by Partnership Chair Cara Mendelsohn and Board Member Rob Hays. Additionally, there will be discussions on the revision of the Articles of Incorporation and Bylaws, which are crucial for the governance of the organization. A report on the performance of the system addressing homelessness will also be presented by Dr. Theresa Daniel.

**Action Items**:  
The meeting seeks approval of the minutes from the previous meeting and will discuss necessary revisions to the Articles of Incorporation and Bylaws. Feedback from public comments will be considered, and updates on the Temporary Housing Pilot Program will inform future decisions regarding homelessness strategies.
